test-step.description: And In Search by date screen, I type value 9999999 for autocomplete Employee
And In Search by date screen, I choose 9999999 employee in dropdown of autocomplete Employee
And In Search by date screen, I click button 'Search'
And In Search by date screen, I select row 0
And In Search by date screen, I click button 'Edit'
Then The system should open 'Daily Report' page
